abstract.t: This memo specifies how IPv6 only mobile nodes (MN) receiving network-based mobility management using Proxy Mobile IPv6 (PMIPv6) can communicate with IPv4 only servers. The protocol is based on local mobility anchors maintaining a table similar to NAT64 and linking it to the binding cache. This technique avoids the problems encountered when NAT64 is used for mobile nodes. How IPv6 only mobile nodes can receive multicast data from IPv4 only content providers is also explained.
